name: Trash Talk
description:
Source code here! https://github.com/Bobbymcbobface/Brackeys-Game-Jam-2021.2

Submission for brackeys game jam 2021.2

A lone trash can in a desolate world. The only survivors are that of the scum that is trash - and you - the only saviour of this planet THE TRASH CAN. Pelt trash into the enemies face and watch as their wiped from existence, squish the worms feasting on the meat of the rotten apple and reach the door to escape the trechourous enviroment and the enemies you can never defeat.

Be carefull - chaos will ensue...
